name: Tank Online
description:
Tanks Online

Play with your friends in an entertaining multiplayer game. Create and join the same room and enjoy a relaxing game.

Use W to move forward, S to move backward and A & D to rotate and SPACE to shoot if you're on PC. Use the buttons to achieve the same results if you're on Android.

100% cross-platform compatibility: you can join your friends on PC, Android and even in your browser here on itch.io and play together whenever you want.
